answers.answer: Why do you have to get induced anyway??? My son was dropped and in position from week 35. He was born naturally at 40 + 1. Babies can drop in and out of position. Although it's a good sign that baby is nearly ready I wouldn't get excited just yet.

I have a lot of complications. Diabetes, breathing problems, and developing preeclampsia so that's why I have to be induced. My baby will be better off outside of the womb. But I'm not getting induced until 37 weeks and Thats if he doesn't come before then
How far are you now hun

question: How long before his arrival (I have to get induced anyway
title: my baby has dropped
